metadata.name: Pont Des Arts Locks
metadata.description:
(Social Experiment)  
Claim your lock to secure you spot on the virtual Pont Des Art. More info soon, but for now make your mark in NFT history and claim your lock before the bridge is locked forever!

Help spread awareness, we want ever member of the NFT community to be included on the Pont Des Arts Virtual 2022 Bridge. Lets end 2022 with LOVE!
